rules:
    has-termsOfService:
        x-tags:
            :
        message: API MUST reference the URL of the Terms of Service in #/info/termsOfService.
        description: API MUST reference the URL of the Terms of Service in `#/info/termsOfService`
        given: $
        severity: error
        recommended: true
        type: style
        formats:
            :
        then:
            field: info.termsOfService
            function: truthy
